summary: Ego vehicle is driving straight on a multi-lane road. There are several vehicles ahead. A pedestrian/cyclist suddenly appears from behind a large planter on the left side of the road.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. Other vehicles are also moving forward in the same direction. A pedestrian/cyclist is crossing the road from left to right.
characters: A pedestrian/cyclist wearing a red helmet.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, other vehicles, pedestrian/cyclist, large planter, road signs.
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely brake or swerve to avoid the pedestrian/cyclist.
